message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the product's true worth of $800,000 to you. I am confident it will provide substantial returns on your investment. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $950,000 is higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product, which still represents a significant gain for you. Let's work together to find a mutually beneficial price.
